metadata.title: Chicotta Retro Style Shield Shaped Oxidized 925 Sterling Silver Ring for Men
features: Retro Style Solid .925 Sterling Silver Ring for men with 925 Mark | Excellent Quality Handmade Craftsmanship.
Style: Engraved monolithic body. Curved shield design perfectly wraps the finger and the ring especially shows itself in the middle finder.
Weight: 11gr (0.39oz) +/- 5% (depends on size) | Please refer to the images for the approximate dimensions.
US sizes available from 7.5 to 13 | The ring comes with a free gift-box and can be a nice gift for yourself or your loved ones
description: Our ring is made of 925 sterling pure silver. It is produced in one piece with rounded protrusions and honeycomb design base. Inspired by warrior armor, this unusual and unique design symbolizes self-protection and power. With its well-balanced design, the ring perfectly shows itself especially in the middle finger. It has traces of 80s with its curved structure, oxidized blackened base and polished surface. The back of the ring is specially designed. It is made in Turkey and manufactured with great care by Turkish craftsmen who are known for their silver embroidery. Among our products is the ring with the most labor. Our ring comes in a gift box. As Chicotta, we hope it will be a nice gift for you and your loved ones.
